creation_history: Created by Agni on December 13th, 2021. Reason: While he was working on yakmail (see below), he apparently deleted the entire hair, [creating shavedyak accidentally](https://discord.com/channels/830522505605283862/830525235803586570/919965580365287455). Linus was quick to point out that ["This is cursed, I'd be happy to add it as :shavedyak:"](https://discord.com/channels/830522505605283862/830525235803586570/919966596460589096).
description: A completely shaved or even naked yak. The ultimate endpoint in the yakshaving sequence.
name: Shavedyak
